<xen:title>{xen:phrase bdbank_transfer, 'money={xen:phrase bdbank_money}'}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'bank/transfer'}">
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase bdbank_transfer_receivers}:" name="receivers" inputclass="AutoComplete" hint="{xen:phrase separate_names_with_comma}" />
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase bdbank_transfer_amount}:" name="amount" hint="{xen:phrase bdbank_you_can_input_negative_value}" />
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase bdbank_transfer_comment}:" name="comment" rows="2" inputclass="Elastic" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase bdbank_transfer_do}" /> </xen:form>

<xen:checkboxunit label=" "> <xen:option name="bdbank_show_money" selected="{$user.bdbank_show_money}">{xen:phrase bdbank_privacy_show_money, 'money_lowercase={xen:phrase bdbank_money_lowercase}'}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<!-- [bd] Banking / Mark --> <fieldset> <!-- [bd] Banking / Mark -->

phrases.phrase: The uploader set a price for this download. You have to pay before you can continue...
Only transactions made in the last {days} days are available.
Bonus being liked in a post

Field {field} could not be found in {table}. You must use an existing field as money field for [bd] Banking. If you are integrating this add-on with another add-on, please make sure you fully understand what you are doing. Seeking advice from the other add-on's author is recommended.
Sorry, Get More is currently not supported yet.
Sorry, no purchase package is available at the moment. Please try again later.
Sorry, we do not support paying with currency {currency}.
You currently have {balance}, you will have {balanceAfter} after this.
After rebuilding bonuses, you MUST rebuild user account information!
You don't have enough {money_lowercase} in your account to issue refund for this transaction of {refund_amount}. Your current account balance is {balance}.
The requested transaction could not be found.
Tax for this transaction is {tax}. {receiver} will only receive {amount}.
There are no attachments to display.
There are no transactions to display.
This will allow people to see how much {money_lowercase} you have in various places like posts or your profile.
Transferred a total amount of {total}. Thank you.
We can not authorize your transfer request. Please contact our staff to resolve your problem. You can specify this error code: {error}. Sorry for any inconveniences.
Sorry, you cannot transfer {total} when you have only {balance}.
Sorry, you must specify receivers for the transaction.
Sorry, the receiver {username} could not be identified.
Sorry, you cannot transfer to yourself.
Total amount is {total}. You currently have {balance}, you will have {balanceAfter} after this.
You are trying to refund to
You are trying to transfer to
User has at least X of {money_lowercase}
Use forum-based value instead of system-wide value (set at {value})
When the payment has been approved, the requested fund will be transfered to and made available for your account.
Enter password to access this content.

Money will be formatted before output, you can specify the format here. In order to change the currency symbol, just edit the phrase "bdbank_currency_name". If you want to call money something else (for example: point), you will need to edit 2 phrases: "bdbank_money" and "bdbank_money_lowercase".

The uploader will get this bonus when somebody (non-guest) downloads his/her attachment. The file extension will be checked before processing. It's not recommend to enable bonus for images because they can be embedded into the post and it's a little unfair to give the bonus in those cases. The format is {extension} = {bonus}, you can separate extensions by comma, to match all extension, simply use a single asterisk. The list will be matched top down.
The bonus will be multiplied if multiple files are attached in a post. When the target post is hard deleted or the attachment is removed individually, the bonus will be taken away accordingly.
The poster will get this bonus when somebody likes his/her post. The bonus will be taken away only when the post is hard deleted.
The first post of a thread won't get this bonus point. When the post is hard deleted, the bonus will be taken away.
When the thread is hard deleted, the bonus will be taken away.

The database table containing transactions will be cleaned up regularly to keep it from going too big. Old records will be moved to another table to archive. You can specify the maximum days to keep a transaction in the primary table here. This also means users will only be able to see history for this number of days. To disable this feature, enter 0.

You can let [bd] Bank act as a pay gate and work with [bd] Paygates add-on to purchase user group upgrades and other things. Each line must has the format {currency}={money} which means 1 unit of {currency} should equal to {money} in virtual currency. Leave this option blank to disable this feature.

If you want to integrate [bd] Banking with other add-ons, you can change the money field to any other field in `xf_user` table. If you are not sure about this option, it's likely that you shouldn't change it at all. The default value is "bdbank_money", change the value back if you run into problems.

You can allow users to purchase money by real currencies. Each line must has the format {money}={amount}{currency}. Please note that this feature requires additional add-on (e.g. [bd] Paygates add-on) and properly set permissions, consult the document for further information. Leave this option blank to disable this feature.
Sometimes the Bank account will show up with an avatar (mostly in transaction history). You can use any image you want by uploading to Gravatar and enter the email address here.
You can set a minimum tax amount for all transaction. If the tax calculated using tax rules are smaller than this value, it will be used as the transaction's tax.
User will get this penalty (money taken away) if he/she unlikes a post.
Only posts that longer than this specified number of characters (quoted text, bbcode tag excluded) will receive bonus. This applies for thread bonus and post bonus.
If enabled, system transactions will be displayed in user's history page. Otherwise they will only be available in AdminCP history page.

Each line must contain one rule. Each rule has the format of "{cutoff}:{percent}" (please notice the colon between 2 values). The tax percent will be calculated top down. The default rules are:

50:0
500:5
*:10

Example:
Transfer $10. Tax = 0
Transfer $50. Tax = 0
Transfer $100. Tax = ($100 - $50) * 5% = $2.5 = $3
Transfer $500. Tax = ($500 - $50) * 5% = $22.5 = $23
Transfer $600. Tax = ($500 - $50) * 5% + ($600 - $500) * 10% = $32.5 = $33
Transfer $1000. Tax = ($500 - $50) * 5% + ($1000 - $500) * 10% = $72.5 = $73

Turn on this option will add one additional option in the transfer form. Sender who wants to pay tax for the transaction can check the box and let the receiver(s) get the exact amount of the transaction.
Display the amount of money of the message author (add-on: [bd] Banking). Please note that user can change policy settings to hide this information.
Automatically insert a tab to the navigation bar to let users quickly access Banking functions (add-on: [bd] Banking).
Display the amount of money of the logged in visitor in the visitor panel right next to Alerts on every page (add-on: [bd] Banking).
Display the amount of money of the logged in visitor in the visitor panel at the top of sidebar on every page (add-on: [bd] Banking).

property.title: Show Author Money
property.description: Display the amount of money of the message author (add-on: [bd] Banking). Please note that user can change policy settings to hide this information.

property.title: Insert "Bank" tab
property.description: Automatically insert a tab to the navigation bar to let users quickly access Banking functions (add-on: [bd] Banking).

property.title: Show Visitor Money
property.description: Display the amount of money of the logged in visitor in the visitor panel at the top of sidebar on every page (add-on: [bd] Banking).

property.title: Show Visitor Money
property.description: Display the amount of money of the logged in visitor in the visitor panel right next to Alerts on every page (add-on: [bd] Banking).

<xen:require js="js/bdBank/transfer.js" />
<xen:title>{xen:phrase bdbank_refund}</xen:title>
<form action="{xen:link '{xen:helper bdBank_routePrefix}/refund'}" method="post" class="xenForm AutoValidator formOverlay" data-redirect="1"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase bdbank_transfer_trying_refund_to}:</dt> <dd>{$transaction.from_user.username}</dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase bdbank_refund_amount}:</dt> <dd>{xen:helper bdBank_balanceFormat, {xen:calc '{$transaction.amount} - {$transaction.tax_amount}'}}</dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase bdbank_refund}" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="transaction_id" value="{$transaction.transaction_id}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> </form>
